alfredsnippet.snippet:
Good morning NAME, 

I interviewed for the ROLE role on DATE. I'm checking in to see if one, you have a status update on your hiring decision, and two, if there's any additional information I can provide to strengthen my application.

To reiterate, I believe I'd be a great fit for this role for these reasons. And then, like, name three reasons.

I know hiring a ROLE is tough. Please let me know if there's anything I can do to help.

Thank you so much. 

Have a great rest of your week,

Harley
alfredsnippet.name: Interview Follow-up
